pronunciation.pinyin: āi mò dà yú xīn sǐ
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: ai1 mo4 da4 yu2 xin1 si3

meanings.value: nothing sadder than a withered heart (idiom attributed to Confucius by Zhuangzi 莊子|庄子[Zhuang1 zi3])
no greater sorrow than a heart that never rejoices
the worst sorrow is not as bad as an uncaring heart
nothing is more wretched than apathy
